CardNode.Name: Farm Life
CardNode.Description: Life on a farm is tough. Waking at the crack of dawn and working until sun sets. It breeds hard people, strong willed and strong armed.

CardNode.Name: The Harvest
CardNode.Description: Harvest time is always the most exhausting time of the year, and the culmination of all the efforts you have put in to this point. Don't mess it up!

CardNode.Name: Farmers Market
CardNode.Description: The farmers market is an opportunity to finally make some money by selling the produce you have grown.

CardNode.Name: Raiding Party
CardNode.Description: Your peaceful farm life is shattered by the chittering cries of goblins smashing their way into your house.
